member.name: T:GemBox.Imaging.ComponentInfo
member.summary: Contains static licensing methods and diagnostic information about executing GemBox.Imaging assembly.

member.name: E:GemBox.Imaging.ComponentInfo.FreeLimitReached
member.summary: Occurs in loading or saving when GemBox.Imaging assembly is used with FREE-LIMITED-KEY license key, and the free limit is reached.

member.name: P:GemBox.Imaging.ComponentInfo.InfoOut
member.summary: Used for outputting information logs about GemBox.Imaging.

member.name: P:GemBox.Imaging.ComponentInfo.Title
member.summary: Gets GemBox.Imaging assembly title.
member.value: GemBox.Imaging assembly title.

member.name: P:GemBox.Imaging.ComponentInfo.FullVersion
member.summary: Gets GemBox.Imaging assembly full version.
member.value: GemBox.Imaging assembly full version.

member.name: M:GemBox.Imaging.ComponentInfo.SetLicense(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the license (serial) key.
member.param: The serial key.

remarks.para: You should call this method before using any other class from GemBox.Imaging assembly.
The key can only be set once (if you try another key, it will be ignored).
The best place to call this method is from a static constructor of your application's main class.
Valid serial key has multiple groups of alphanumeric characters, separated with dashes.
To use the assembly in free limited mode use, FREE-LIMITED-KEY as .
For more information about GemBox.Imaging evaluation and licensing, see evaluation and licensing.

member.name: T:GemBox.Imaging.FilterBuilder
member.summary: Represents a builder for configuring an image or image frame filter.

member.name: M:GemBox.Imaging.FilterBuilder.Red(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the intensity of the red channel.
member.param: An intensity value in a range from -100 (no red channel) to 100 (double red channel intensity).

member.name: M:GemBox.Imaging.FilterBuilder.Green(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the intensity of the green channel.
member.param: An intensity value in a range from -100 (no green channel) to 100 (double green channel intensity).

member.name: M:GemBox.Imaging.FilterBuilder.Blue(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the intensity of the blue channel.
member.param: An intensity value in a range from -100 (no blue channel) to 100 (double blue channel intensity).

member.name: M:GemBox.Imaging.FilterBuilder.Alpha(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the alpha channel.
member.param: A transparency value in a range from 0 (no transparency) to 100 (full transparency).

member.name: M:GemBox.Imaging.FilterBuilder.Brightness(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the brightness.
member.param: A brightness value in a range from -100 (full black) to 100 (full white).

member.name: M:GemBox.Imaging.FilterBuilder.Contrast(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the contrast.
member.param: A contrast value in a range from -100 (full black) to 100 (full white).

member.name: M:GemBox.Imaging.FilterBuilder.Hue(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets hue.
member.param: A hue angle value between 0 and 360.

member.name: M:GemBox.Imaging.FilterBuilder.Saturation(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the saturation (chroma).
member.param: A saturation value in a range from -100 (grayscale) to 100 (fully saturated).

member.name: T:GemBox.Imaging.Gif.GifColorTableMode
member.summary: Describes the available color table calculation modes.

member.name: F:GemBox.Imaging.Gif.GifColorTableMode.Global
member.summary: A single color table will be calculated from the first frame and reused for subsequent frames.

member.name: F:GemBox.Imaging.Gif.GifColorTableMode.Local
member.summary: A unique color table will be calculated for each frame.

member.name: T:GemBox.Imaging.Gif.GifDisposalMethod
member.summary: Describes the Gif decoder disposal method.

member.name: F:GemBox.Imaging.Gif.GifDisposalMethod.Unspecified
member.summary: The decoder will not take any action.

member.name: F:GemBox.Imaging.Gif.GifDisposalMethod.NotDispose
member.summary: The graphic will be left in place.

member.name: F:GemBox.Imaging.Gif.GifDisposalMethod.RestoreToBackground
member.summary: The area used by the graphic will be restored to the background color.

member.name: F:GemBox.Imaging.Gif.GifDisposalMethod.RestoreToPrevious
member.summary: The decoder will restore the area overwritten by the graphic with what was there prior to rendering the graphic.

member.name: T:GemBox.Imaging.Gif.GifFrameMetadata
member.summary: Represents the metadata of a frame in a GIF image.

member.name: P:GemBox.Imaging.Gif.GifFrameMetadata.FrameDelay
member.summary: Gets or sets the frame delay for animated images.
member.remarks: If not 0, when utilized in Gif animation, this field specifies a time to wait before continuing with the processing of the data stream. The clock starts ticking immediately after the graphic is rendered.

member.summary: Creates a new that is a copy of the current instance.
member.returns: A new that is a copy of this instance.

member.name: T:GemBox.Imaging.Gif.GifMetadata
member.summary: Represents a GIF format specific metadata.

member.name: P:GemBox.Imaging.Gif.GifMetadata.RepeatCount
member.summary:
Gets or sets the number of times any animation is repeated.
0 means to repeat indefinitely, count is set as repeat n-1 times. Defaults to 1.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified collection of image frames.
member.param: A list containing the images that contain frames to be included in the image.

member.name: F:GemBox.Imaging.TiffCompression.Default
member.summary: The System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TiffBitmapEncoder encoder attempts to save the bitmap with the best possible compression schema.

member.name: F:GemBox.Imaging.TiffCompression.None
member.summary: The Tagged Image File Format (TIFF) image is not compressed.

member.name: F:GemBox.Imaging.TiffCompression.CcittGroup3Fax
member.summary: The CCITT3 compression schema is used.

member.name: F:GemBox.Imaging.TiffCompression.CcittGroup4Fax
member.summary: The CCITT4 compression schema is used.

member.name: F:GemBox.Imaging.TiffCompression.Lzw
member.summary: The LZW compression schema is used.

member.name: F:GemBox.Imaging.TiffCompression.Rle
member.summary: The RLE compression schema is used.

member.name: F:GemBox.Imaging.TiffCompression.Zip
member.summary: Zip compression schema is used.

member.name: T:GemBox.Imaging.TiffSaveOptions
member.summary: Represents a class which stores saving options for TIF file format.

member.name: P:GemBox.Imaging.TiffSaveOptions.Compression
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the type of compression that is used by this Tagged Image File Format (TIFF) image.
member.returns: One of the values. The default is .
